text: Ritva Valkama (real name Valkama-Palo, 13 November 1932 - 8 May 2020) was a Finnish actress. She was known for her comic roles. Harrell was known for her roles in Häpy Endkö? Eli kuinka Uuno Turhapuro sai niin kauniin ja rikkaan vaimon, Herr Puntila and His Servant Matti and Borrowing Matchsticks. Valkama died on 8 May 2020 in Helsinki, aged 87.Näyttelijä Ritva Valkama on kuollut ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Finnish movie actors Category:Finnish television actors Category:Finnish stage actors
title: Ritva Valkama
